text: Andy Manuel Marte (October 21, 1983 – January 22, 2017) was a Dominican professional baseball third baseman. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Atlanta Braves, Cleveland Indians and Arizona Diamondbacks. He also played in the KBO League for the KT Wiz. He was born in Villa Tapia, Dominican Republic. Marte was killed in a car crash near San Francisco de Macorís, Dominican Republic on January 22, 2017, aged 33. ==References== ==Other websites== *Career statistics and player information from Korea Baseball Organization Category:1983 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Dominican Republic baseball players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Arizona Diamondbacks players
title: Andy Marte
